retrieved_chunks.text:
Page 1: Executive Summary
    
    This policy document outlines our investment guidelines for renewable energy projects.
    The company is committed to sustainable investing and will prioritize clean energy initiatives.
    
    Page 2: Investment Categories
    
    We will invest in the following renewable energy sectors:
    - Solar photovoltaic systems
    - Wind energy projects
    - Hydroelectric power
    - Geothermal energy
    - Biomass and bioenergy
    
    Page 3: Exclusion Policy
    
    The following investments are strictly prohibited:
    - Coal-fired power plants
    - Oil and gas exploration
    - Nuclear energy projects (unless specifically approved)
    - Any fossil fuel infrastructure
    
    Page 4: Investment Limits
    
    Maximum investment amounts per project:
    - Solar: $50 million
    - Wind: $75 million
    - Hydro: $100 million
    - Geothermal: $25 million
    
    Page 5: Risk Assessment
